etymology.interpretation: Water signals meanings related to liquids and waves. 良 serves as the phonetic, approximating the older pronunciation that developed into làng. Senses broadened from physical waves to metaphorical ideas of being unrestrained or extravagant.

examples.chinese: 海上掀起巨浪(海上掀起巨浪)。
examples.english: Huge waves rose on the sea.

examples.chinese: 他是个浪子(他是個浪子)。
别太浪费钱(別太浪費錢)。
examples.english: Don’t be too wasteful with money.
